name: glorious-frontend
description: Frontend application foundation featuring TypeScript, React, and Sass.

scripts.build: rimraf build && tsc && set NODE_ENV=production&& browserify build/main.js | uglifyjs -m > build/main.bundle.js && node-sass --source-map true src/style.scss build/style.css && echo Build complete.
scripts.build-debug: rimraf build && tsc && browserify --debug build/main.js > build/main.bundle.js && node-sass --source-map true src/style.scss build/style.css && echo Build complete.
scripts.test: echo Not test driven, lol && exit 0
